Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to adoption of shelter animals
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Adoption of shelter animals.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to making it unlawful to work carriage horses in certain conditions
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Making it unlawful to work carriage horses in certain conditions.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the trafficking of wild birds
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting the trafficking of wild birds.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the establishment of an office of animal welfare
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of an office of animal welfare.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to retrieval of companion animals by an animal shelter after an eviction or order or judgment granting legal possession
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Retrieval of companion animals by an animal shelter after an eviction or order or judgment granting legal possession.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the New York City police department to report data regarding animal cruelty complaints
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the NYPD to report data regarding animal cruelty complaints.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the welfare of shelter animals
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Welfare of shelter animals.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increased fines and penalties for animal abuse
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increased fines and penalties for animal abuse.

Items.Title: Resolution to recognize “Meatless Monday” in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Recognize “Meatless Monday” in NYC.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign A6298/S4234, an act to amend the agriculture and markets law and the general business law, in relation to the sale of dogs, cats and rabbits.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Amend the agriculture and markets law and the general business law, in relation to the sale of dogs, cats and rabbits. (A6298/S4234)

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the bordetella vaccination for dogs
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Bordetella vaccination for dogs.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to banning the sale or provision of certain force-fed poultry products
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Banning the sale or provision of certain force-fed poultry products.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign A.286, which would provide a tax credit to each taxpayer who adopts a household pet from a shelter.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Provide a tax credit to each taxpayer who adopts a household pet from a shelter. (A.286)

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to proper disposal of deceased animals
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Proper disposal of deceased animals.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States Congress to pass, and the President to sign, H.R. 724 and S. 479, the Preventing Animal Cruelty Torture Act, otherwise known as the PACT Act.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Preventing Animal Cruelty Torture Act, otherwise known as the PACT Act. (H.R. 724 and S. 479)
